data:
## class_ContentAsSlotDirective
Directive that allows to pass the templateRef associated to a ng-content to a store.
The input of the directive is a WritableSignal<{children: [SlotContent](./types#slotcontent)<T>}>.

### Type Parameters

• **T** *extends* `object`

### Implements

- [`OnInit`](https://angular.dev/api/core/OnInit)

### Constructors

#### new ContentAsSlotDirective

> **new ContentAsSlotDirective**\<`T`\>(): [`ContentAsSlotDirective`](#contentasslotdirective)\<`T`\>

##### Returns

[`ContentAsSlotDirective`](#contentasslotdirective)\<`T`\>

### Properties

#### auContentAsSlot

> **auContentAsSlot**: [`WritableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/WritableSignal.html)\<`object`, `object`\>

##### Type declaration

###### children?

> `optional` **children**: [`SlotContent`](./types#slotcontent)\<`T`\>

***

#### templateRef

> **templateRef**: [`TemplateRef`](https://angular.dev/api/core/TemplateRef)\<`any`\>

### Methods

#### ngOnInit

> **ngOnInit**(): `void`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Inherit Doc

##### Implementation of

`OnInit.ngOnInit`
